original_text: Then Jehoiada brought the king's son out of the temple room. He put the crown onto Joash's head. He gave him a copy of the royal covenant. They poured olive oil on his head to show that he was now the king. They clapped their hands and they shouted, ‘May the king have a long life!’
korean_text: 여호야다가 왕자를 인도하여 내어 왕관을 씌우며 율법책을 주고 기름을 부어 왕으로 삼으매 무리가 박수하며 왕의 만세를 부르니라

sentences.original_text: Then Jehoiada brought the king's son out of the temple room.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 여호야다가 왕의 아들을 성전 방에서 데려왔습니다.

sentences.original_text: He put the crown onto Joash's head.
He gave him a copy of the royal covenant.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그에게 왕의 계약서 사본을 주었습니다.

sentences.original_text: They poured olive oil on his head
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그의 머리에 올리브 기름을 부었습니다.

sentences.original_text: to show that he was now the king.
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 그가 왕이 되었음을 보여주기 위해.

sentences.original_text: and they shouted, 'May the king have a long life!'
